name: B. Love Song
statement:
Petya once wrote a sad love song and shared it to Vasya. The song is a
string consisting of lowercase English letters. Vasya made up q
questions about this song. Each question is about a subsegment of the
song starting from the l-th letter to the r-th letter. Vasya considers a
substring made up from characters on this segment and repeats each
letter in the subsegment k times, where k is the index of the
corresponding letter in the alphabet. For example, if the question is
about the substring "", then Vasya repeats letter ” once, each of the
letters ” twice, letter ’" three times, so that the resulting string is
"", its length is 10. Vasya is interested about the length of the
resulting string.Help Petya find the length of each string obtained by
Vasya.
